segments.text: I see the little girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s expecting something wonderful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent she seems, just reaching up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water on the floor or the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All she cares about is getting that cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to get cookies before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so trusting, like she knows he’ll give her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop the jar or the plate he’s holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But for now, she’s just standing there, waiting so patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, even if it’s a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
